roleset.name: cause to have a crust
roleset.note: ENCRUST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'encrust' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.8. (from encrust.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: sometimes 'encrust in'
example.text: Of his 10 novels, ``The Hive'' (1951), full of sharp vignettes of Madrid life and centered on a cafe run by Dona Rosa, a foul-mouthed, broad-based woman with [blackened little teeth]-1 encrusted [*]-1 in filth, used to be available in English, translated by J.M. Cohen and published by Ecco Press, which now no doubt regrets relinquishing its copyright.

example.name: not usually pie crusts
example.text: John encrusted his apple pie with toothpaste.
